summary: Emma and her family are unhappy after moving to her house; one day she went to the attic and found someone who looked like her and began haunting her.
cast: Elisabeth Moss|Catherine Mary Stewart|John Savage|Tom Malloy|Lynn-Marie Stetson|Alexandra Daddario|Jason Lewis|Gil Deeble|Nick Gregory|Thomas Jay Ryan|Clark Middleton|Betsy Aidem|Tara Thompson|L.J. Ganser|Colleen Fitzgerald|Denise Wilbanks|Sara Maraffino|Russell Terlecki
title: El reverso oscuro de Emma Callan
